title: 20. Yaa Asantewaa: Rebel Queen Mother
itunes:title: 20. Yaa Asantewaa: Rebel Queen Mother
description: Season 2, Episode 9: Jay tells Alex about Yaa Asantewaa, the Queen Mother who led the Ashanti in their final Rebellion against British Colonialism.
